fr_FR.description: Ce mod ajoute des objets dans le monde de BGEE et BG2EE. Chaque élément est totalement optionnel lors de l'installation. Vous n'en aimez qu'un ? N'en installez qu'un seul.

en_US.description: This mod adds items to the world of BGEE and BG2EE. Each item is completely optional on installation. Like only one? Install just one.

components.101: Add Everburn Blade (Everburn Blade; two-handed sword)
components.103: Add Crimson Mischief (Crimson Mischief; short sword)
components.107: Add Spell Siphon (Arcane Absorption Dagger; cut content dagger)
components.108: Add Cruel Sting (Cruel Sting; long sword)
components.110: Add The Deathstalker Mantle (The Deathstalker Mantle; cloak)
components.205: Add Ring of Hardiness (Dark Souls - Ring of Steel Protection; ring)
components.211: Add Sage Ring (Dark Souls 3 - Sage Ring; ring)
components.213: Add Hawk Ring (Dark Souls 3 - Hawk Ring; ring)
components.214: Add Blade of Calling (Elden Ring; dagger)
components.215: Add Moonlit Slumber (Elden Ring - Sword of St. Trina, long sword)
components.216: Add Icicle (Elden Ring - Frozen Needle; rapier)
components.217: Add Stygian Fury (Elden Ring - Rivers of Blood; katana)
components.220: Add Harp Bow (Elden Ring - Harp Bow; shortbow/longbow)
components.221: Add Sseth's Revenge / Sseth's Fangs (Elden Ring - Serpent Bow / Serpent Arrows; shortbow / arrows)
components.222: Add Crimson of Life (Elden Ring - Crimson Amber Amulet; necklace)
components.223: Add Spellguard (Elden Ring - Spelldrake Amulet; necklace)
components.224: Add Periapt of Renewal (Elden Ring - Blessed Dew Amulet; necklace)
components.227: Add Bloody Sting (Elden Ring - Bloody Helice; estoc)
components.228: Add Storm's Monarch (Elden Ring - Dragon King's Cragblade; estoc)
components.302: Add The Left Hand (The Left Hand; dagger)
components.303: Add Master Li's Way (Master Li's Way; katana)
components.304: Add Kukri of the Eclipse (Kukri of the Eclipse; dagger / kukri)
components.307: Add Blade of the Rashemi (Blade of the Rashemi; two-handed sword)
components.308: Add Shining Light of Lathander (Shining Light of Lathander; two-handed sword)
components.313: Add Shining Light (Shining Light; dart / shuriken)
components.314: Add Arrows of the Vampire (Arrow of the Vampire; arrow)
components.315: Add Squire's Defense (Squire's Defense; studded leather armor)
components.403: Add Phantom's Blade (Phantom's Monomolecular Sword; ninja-to)
components.501: Add Needle (Game of Thrones - Needle; rapier)
components.502: Add Craven Edge (The Legend of Vox Machina - Craven Edge; two-handed sword)

zh_CN.description: 该模组在博德之门增强版和博德之门Ⅱ增强版的世界中添加了物品。每个元素在安装时都是完全可选的。你只喜欢其中一个？那就只安装一个。
